SEARCH
Package jakarta.faces.event

Class PreRemoveFlashValueEvent

java.lang.Object
java.util.EventObject
jakarta.faces.event.SystemEvent
jakarta.faces.event.PreRemoveFlashValueEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PreRemoveFlashValueEvent extends SystemEvent

This event must be published by a call to Application.publishEvent(jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext, java.lang.Class<? extends jakarta.faces.event.SystemEvent>, java.lang.Object) when a value is removed from the flash.

Since:
2.2
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • PreRemoveFlashValueEvent

      public PreRemoveFlashValueEvent(String key)

      Instantiate a new PreRemoveFlashValueEvent that indicates the argument key will be removed from the flash. If the argument is null, the literal Flash.NULL_VALUE must be passed to the superclass constructor.

      Parameters:
      key - the key in the flash that was just added.

    • PreRemoveFlashValueEvent

      public PreRemoveFlashValueEvent(FacesContext facesContext, String key)

      Instantiate a new PreRemoveFlashValueEvent that indicates the argument key will be removed from the flash. If the argument is null, the literal Flash.NULL_VALUE must be passed to the superclass constructor.

      Parameters:
      facesContext - the Faces context.
      key - the key in the flash that was just added.
